description: This file defines a RecyclerView.Adapter implementation called NoteAdapter for displaying a list of Note objects in an Android application. It includes an inner ViewHolder class, manages note data, and handles item click events.

classes.name: NoteAdapter
classes.description: A RecyclerView Adapter for displaying notes with click handling.

methods.name: NoteAdapter
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the adapter with a click listener.

methods.name: setNotes
methods.description: Updates the list of notes displayed by the adapter.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates new view holder instances for each note item.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds note data to the view holder for display.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the total number of notes.
